thread.title: Peter Midhu

author: Peter Midhu
title: Peter Midhu
text:
Only found these guys after Kwik Fit seemed to only allow fitting within a few days on the most expensive tyres yet affordable options were all 5 day waits - not an option with a flat!
Flexible payment terms, free at home fitting and next day. The fitter was professional and arrived an hour earlier than the eta window. Faultless experience. Will be using them from now on, if you use Kwik Fit mobile fitting Try TOTD...seriously!!!
